Meanwhile more flying toys appear, first Fuse and then Smartysaurus. Noddy at last realises that Deltoid, Fuse and Smartysaurus were all in the middle of making a wish when the magic happened and that the culprit is Pat-Pat, who was using Queen Sparklewings' wand to try and make all her friends' wishes come true. programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service

Pat has to deliver special jet boots to the school, built by Ted's inventor friend. Ted will demonstrate them. But on the way to Greendale, Pat stops to help Alf, whose cows have got loose. Pat sees Ajay, out for a day's bird-watching. Pat has promised to lend Ajay his wellies and asks Ajay to get them from the van, but Ajay takes the jet boots by mistake. By the time Pat realises the mixup, Ajay is airborne and can't control the powerful boots... Meanwhile Alf and Ted grow competitive as they try to win the kids' attention. Attempts to shout instructions to Ajay fail, but Pat realises Cedric could be the solution. The brave bird takes an instruction leaflet up to Ajay - who is then able to control the boots (using his toes) with ease! Meera, Julian and the others are delighted as Ajay touches down at Greendale School with the help of Cedric - the most welcome bird Ajay has ever watched!

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: In the wake of the previous episode, the magical creatures have all vanished and the world at large has gone gray. Desperate to fix things, the crew travels to the Magical Realm to confront the omniscient Great Watcher, who was a tempting offer for Yi. The kids manage to retrieve creatures, but being back in the human world is sapping them of their magical energy. Feeling responsible, Yi embarks on a dangerous mission to save everyone – but it’s the community of creatures and humans alike that instead come to Yi’s rescue. Together, they realize that their connections to one another are the most powerful magic of all.

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The World Today is the core rolling service of CGTN. keep viewers up-to-date with all the world's top stories as they happen.

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and “accepted wisdom” to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You won’t find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of today’s world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from “Prove That Climate Change Exists” to “Who Will Win the Race to Space”. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk; Challenging perceptions.

programme.title: Africa Live
programme.desc: Africa Live is a news program that focuses on African issues and issues related to this diverse continent. CGTN's Nairobi-based broadcast center produces Africa Live.

programme.title: Talk Africa
programme.desc: Talk Africa is a weekly discussion show that brings the most influential voices in Africa to the world.

programme.title: Sports Scene
programme.desc: Sports Scene brings you closer to all the action from all corners of the world, with highlights from across Europe, North America and China's top sports leagues.

programme.title: Biz Talk
programme.desc: A groundbreaking 30-minute interview show, giving an in-depth look into how top companies around the world conduct business and how policymakers view the fast-changing world economy. It presents 360 degree profiles of industry movers and shakers, tech mavericks and policymakers, and drills down on the stories behind their success, to give you clarity on what’s happening in every facet of business.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: Our crew heads out of the city to reconnect with nature at a once-popular campsite, now deserted and in ruins owing to the urban legend of Yeren: a huge, hairy man who escaped from clown school as the tale goes. After some campfire spookiness, the crew comes face-to-face with the actual Yeren, who turns out to be a benevolent, camouflaging creature. The crew and Yeren team up to rejuvenate the campsite and keep it from being shut down.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: Po and team play a game of Pok-ta-pok against a family of armadillos for the opportunity to talk one on one with Zuma, the leader. programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: The Dragon Knights make a deal for the Storm Wheel but first must obtain the other Storm Wheel from a mysterious mad scientist. programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: The Mad Scientist turns out to be an ally called Akna, who has a history with Blade's brother Alfie. And Blade learns another truth about her brother and his mission. And in the course of a skirmish with Klaus and Veruca, the weapons change hands again.

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show
programme.desc: When Sherman invites Johnny Appleseed to the show to grow a forest and build his dream treehouse, Peabody tries to prevent a chaotic woodland invasion

programme.title: Casper's Scare School
programme.desc: Abra-Ca-Deedstown From cleaning Ra's sarcophagus, to starring in Jimmy's magic act, Casper has been helping so much, he's exhausted. Shrinky Dust When magical Shrinky Dust falls into Norman the bully's hands, Casper and Jimmy find themselves on a hunt to get it back.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective
programme.desc: When Noddy sees Deltoid flying in the air he decides to investigate: how can they get Deltoid down? Realising that magic is involved, Noddy goes to see Queen Sparklewings to see if she can help but she tells him her wand has gone missing. Someone must be trying to do magic with her wand! Meanwhile more flying toys appear, first Fuse and then Smartysaurus. Noddy at last realises that Deltoid, Fuse and Smartysaurus were all in the middle of making a wish when the magic happened and that the culprit is Pat-Pat, who was using Queen Sparklewings' wand to try and make all her friends' wishes come true. Reunited with her wand, Queen Sparklewings is able to bring down the toys. Another successful case for Noddy!

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service
programme.desc: Julian and the kids at Greendale School are excited about a Festival of flight - Ted's coming to talk about aviation and Alf's bringing Cedric the racing pigeon. Pat has to deliver special jet boots to the school, built by Ted's inventor friend. Ted will demonstrate them. But on the way to Greendale, Pat stops to help Alf, whose cows have got loose. Pat sees Ajay, out for a day's bird-watching. Pat has promised to lend Ajay his wellies and asks Ajay to get them from the van, but Ajay takes the jet boots by mistake. By the time Pat realises the mixup, Ajay is airborne and can't control the powerful boots... Meanwhile Alf and Ted grow competitive as they try to win the kids' attention. Attempts to shout instructions to Ajay fail, but Pat realises Cedric could be the solution. The brave bird takes an instruction leaflet up to Ajay - who is then able to control the boots (using his toes) with ease! Meera, Julian and the others are delighted as Ajay touches down at Greendale School with the help of Cedric - the most welcome bird Ajay has ever watched!

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots
programme.desc: It is a windy day in the garden, Fifi's washing has blown away. Poppy offers to find it, but she gets caught in the storm. The other tots set out to find her and spend a wild night out in the open.

programme.desc: Yi and the crew are overrun with pings from humans who are frustrated by creatures they now live alongside. Just when they think they’ve solved one issue, another springs up – and then that original one pops up again too! Meanwhile, we see an ominous pedestal of light progressively become more cracked with each fraught human-creature relationship. At her wits’ end, Yi accidentally hurts Peng, Jin, and Everest with her magic. She then notices Everest fading into nothing…

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: In the wake of the previous episode, the magical creatures have all vanished and the world at large has gone gray. Desperate to fix things, the crew travels to the Magical Realm to confront the omniscient Great Watcher, who was a tempting offer for Yi. The kids manage to retrieve creatures, but being back in the human world is sapping them of their magical energy. Feeling responsible, Yi embarks on a dangerous mission to save everyone – but it’s the community of creatures and humans alike that instead come to Yi’s rescue. Together, they realize that their connections to one another are the most powerful magic of all.

programme.title: The Trigonal: Fight for Justice
programme.desc: An international crime syndicate runs a drug-induced underground fighting tournament, where fighters become guinea pigs for experimental drugs. A retired MMA champion is forced to fight in the tournament. The syndicate thugs brutally assault his wife and kill his best friend, leaving him with no other choice but to fight for justice.

programme.title: The Fishermen and the Sea S3
programme.desc: The new season of this Korean fishing variety show, hosted by two celebrity hosts who are fishing enthusiasts, sets sail with celebrity guests such as K-Pop idols Lee Know (Straykids), Yuno (Ateez), and Ha Sung Woon (Wanna One). The programme features some beautiful fishing spots around Korea and shares useful fishing tips with the viewers.

programme.title: Iron Ball
programme.desc: This sports entertainment show brings the best special forces from Iron Squad to take on a new challenge – dodgeball. The 26 players will enter a fierce competition, until a strongest team armed with powerful athletic endurance and mental strength is formed. Witness how they compete in front of the star athletes and legendary dodgeball coaches!

programme.title: 10 Fight 10 Season 3
programme.desc: The show brings Thai superstars, singers, boxers, models and rappers into the celebrity boxing ring. Season 2 features a first ever Thai female match and Season 3 has two Olympics gold medalists competing for the championship. This unique boxing show offers all-round entertainment, with live performances, lavish costumes and real fights with blood!

programme.title: Hidden Heroine
programme.desc: A drug cartel is entrenched in the Dong Zhou area. Mei Jing of the Thunderbolt Women’s Commando Unit, leads her team to attack the drug base, but they are being ambushed and the identity of Mei’s father as an undercover is exposed. After a fierce battle, Mei and her team manage to successfully defeat the drug cartel and rescue her father.

programme.title: Punish Evil
programme.desc: A shipment of newly issued currency is robbed by three armed robbers, prompting Detective Chang to investigate. Following new leads, he successfully takes down one of the robbers. Meanwhile, the other two plot to rob a gold factory amidst the chaos. With meticulous planning, Chang thwarts their scheme and brings them to justice.

The war between human and demon has just begun!

programme.title: Look Who's Stalking
programme.desc: After the death of her stalker, a new mother pieces her life back together. But when she realises she's being targeted again she's forced to uncover whether she's being stalked from the grave.

programme.title: My Sister's Serial Killer Boyfriend
programme.desc: When her sister starts to fall for their self-defence instructor, reporter Maddie becomes suspicious and tries to intervene before the relationship turns into a deadly obsession.

programme.title: Killer Fortune Teller
programme.desc: When Michael, an older single man looking for companionship, falls for alluring psychic Janis, she sees him as an easy mark. But will Janis be exposed by Virginia, Michael's concerned relative?

programme.title: Couples Retreat Murder
programme.desc: Trying to save their marriage, Becky and Jim head to a couple's retreat which just so happens to include Becky's ex. Things only get worse when one of the guests goes missing and their host is found dead.

programme.title: Zombie House Flipping (S6)
programme.desc: Derek and Chauncey take on a house that was abandoned by previous flippers! Left with holes in the roof, termite damage and a dilapidated porch this house pushes their skills, and budget, to the limit.

programme.title: Zombie House Flipping (S6)
programme.desc: Derek sees big profit potential when he buys a crumbling old house in a nice neighborhood. Chauncey is skeptical of the half-finished work and the small square footage. Was this all a big mistake?

programme.title: Zombie House Flipping (S6)
programme.desc: Derek takes Chauncy to see a house in the super desirable North Dallas neighborhood. Even though this smaller home has foundation issues, Derek feels it's too much of a deal to pass on.

programme.title: Rachael Ray's Meals In Minutes (S2)
programme.desc: Rachael takes us on a Grecian adventure with a recipe for Greek-style lamb meatballs and her very own creation, feta-sghetti, a spaghetti dish served with a decadent white feta sauce.

programme.title: Kings Of BBQ
programme.desc: Walmart has committed to selling AC BBQ rubs and Ced visits Walmart to learn about retail strategies and sidekicks. Mr. Bar-BQ arrives with new prototypes of their ideas and the guys are pleased.

programme.title: A Lifeguard's Obsession
programme.desc: When a lonely, awkward lifeguard saves a well-known woman from drowning, he believes he's earned a place in her life... and her heart.

programme.title: Amish Stud: The Eli Weaver Story
programme.desc: This Lifetime original movie revisits the story of a man who called himself "Amish Stud" and plotted with his mistress to murder his wife, to the horror of his conservative Amish community.

programme.title: Rachael Ray's Meals In Minutes (S2)
programme.desc: Rachael shows us how to spice up a charred tomato sauce and pasta dinner in two ways. In one dish she's serving the pasta over sausage and in the other she pairs the pasta with chickpeas.

programme.title: Rachael Ray's Meals In Minutes (S2)
programme.desc: Rachael celebrates the Italian flag by bringing us three different pastas in all three of its colours. She breaks down the steps to make a delicious cacio e pepe with copious amounts of cheese.

programme.title: Rachael Ray's Meals In Minutes (S2)
programme.desc: Rachael show how to take that favourite summer staple of grilled corn on the cob to a whole new level by combining it with spicy chilli and more, with her recipe for Mexican street corn pasta.

programme.title: Rachael Ray's Meals In Minutes (S2)
programme.desc: In this episode Rachael's in party mode and she's firing up popcorn with popcorn chicken and if you like those both super spicy, you're in the right place at the right time.

programme.title: Lost U-Boats Of WWII
programme.desc: Treasure hunter Darrel Miklos is embarking on a mission to solve one of the most intriguing mysteries in history: the disappearance of the Nazi's looted WWII treasure, estimated to be worth billions.

programme.title: The Curse Of Oak Island (S11)
programme.desc: As the connection between Nolan's Cross and The Knights Templar deepens the team digs up treasure on Lot Five.

programme.title: Forged In Fire (S9)

programme.title: Nagalit Ang Buwan Sa Haba Ng Gabi
programme.desc: A story of married couples but leaves their own spouses for their relationship.

programme.title: Silang Mga Sisiw Sa Lansangan
programme.desc: Four kids stow away from home and became streetchildren. A philantrophist adopted them and treated them as his family until they were held hostages. The kidnapping became news headline which eventually made their parents to know their where-abouts.

programme.title: Paano Ba Ang Magmahal?
programme.desc: Jun (Niño Muhlach) feels neglected as his parents do not have time for him. He leaves home and ends up staying with Dodie (Aga Muhlach). With Dodie, Jun finds the attention and love he wants. But all ends well as it turns out that Dodie's girlfriend is Millet (Pops Fernandez) who also happens to be the niece of Josie's colleague, Ramon (Dante Rivero).

programme.title: Minsan May Pangarap
programme.desc: This is the true story of Aldo Guce and his family, and how they stood upand won against bigotry and the American system of justice. Based on a well-publicized case known among Filipinos in the United States.

programme.title: Paikot-ikot
programme.desc: To help combat street crime,the government forms a task force made up of narcotics agents and private detectives. Rocky and Gracia are the best investigators from the civilian group.

programme.title: Gising Na Ang Higanteng Natutulog
programme.desc: Sgt. Delfin Guerrero (Andy Poe), an honest, kind-hearted and dedicated motorcycle cop who took on corrupt politicians in his mission to uphold the law.

programme.title: Mandurugas
programme.desc: Comedians Dennis Padilla and Janno Gibbs took on the spotlight in this film, which was their first screen team-up. The wacky duo played small-time con-men who, for a quick buck, would do anything or become anything.

programme.title: Ang Misis Kong Hoodlum
programme.desc: When Andy marries Grace, he is surprised to discover that her family are staying with them. Andy becomes the "house-band" and serves his wife and her family.

programme.title: Bobby Barbers, Parak
programme.desc: This is based on the real-life exploits of Bobby Barbers, Secretary of the Department of Interior and Local Government. It chronicles his life as a young lawyer, a politician and most of all as the celebrated no-nonsense law-enforcer, who became the scourge of wrong-doers all over the country.

programme.title: Grease Gun Gang
programme.desc: A renewed ex-convict (Robin Padilla) decided to change his friends’ lifestyle after he came out of the jail.

programme.title: Takot Ka Ba Dilim?
programme.desc: The young stars of TGIS invaded the big screen in this scary, hilarious adventure where they met the monsters of Philippine folklore. The gang went off to the province for their Holy Week vacation and found themselves face to face with mythological creatures.

programme.title: Buhay Mo'y Buhay Ko Rin
programme.desc: They're both members of the police force: he's an undercover assigned to crack a notorious syndicate, and she's a traffic officer tasked to manage the city's clogged streets.

programme.title: Akin Ang Pangarap Mo
programme.desc: Leo is engaged to Anita out of convenience since her father and her parents are long time friends. It was never an issue, until Leo meets Gigi during his stay in the family farm.

programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN presents a wide range of programs from news, current affairs, documentaries, etc. focusing on Japan and Asia.

programme.title: My Street Piano
programme.desc: On a shopping street in front of Kagoshima Chuo Station sits Japan' s original street piano, which passersby love to visit and play from the heart.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: BUDO Secrets
programme.desc: Karate, Taekwondo, Capoeira."Kicks"have evolved in different ways worldwide. Now, an Okinawan Karate master and a Muay Thai champion explore its cutting edge.

programme.title: BOSAI
programme.desc: Can typhoons be controlled? A national project explores solutions using ships and artificial clouds.

programme.title: An Evolving Font
programme.desc: Miyanaga Aiko (Contemporary artist) visits Kyoto. The Mincho font, drawn by hand in around 1990, evokes 350-year-old hand-carved woodblocks, made to print Buddhist sutras.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Kamikaze: An untold History Part1
programme.desc: Kamikaze, explosive-laden ramming attacks, were carried out during World War 2, sacrificing 4,000 lives. Why did the Japanese push forward with this method? We uncover the truth about the kamikaze.

programme.title: AMAMI: Island Colors
programme.desc: Experience the colors of Amami Oshima in beautiful time-lapse footage. Unique hues include "Amami Blue" ocean waters and the glossy black of silk thread that's painstakingly dyed using wood and mud.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Chatroom Japan Special
programme.desc: A pledge in Hiroshima's Peace Memorial Park caused a stir when it was unveiled in the years after the atomic bombing. In our war-torn world, it still raises the question: Who do you think "we"are?

programme.title: Time-lapse Journey
programme.desc: Journey to the great northern land of Japan: Hokkaido. Its scenery changes dramatically throughout the year. Witness the beauty of Hokkaido through time-lapse photography.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Darwin's Amazing Animals
programme.desc: Cute, round-eyed Sengis live in the African savannah. They build complex trails where they raise their young. When threatened, they take off at full speed. This episode looks at their amazing lives.

programme.title: Time-lapse Journey
programme.desc: Nikko, in Tochigi Prefecture, is home to much natural beauty with its great mountains and lakes. The ornate Nikko Toshogu Shrine is famous. See the widely beloved Nikko through time-lapse photography.

programme.title: Viewpoint Science
programme.desc: The proactive science education program which encourages primary and lower secondary school children to discover and investigate the mysteries which puzzle them.

programme.title: Story Land
programme.desc: Leading actors take turns as solo storytellers to act and recite traditional folk tales loved in Japan for centuries. Watch out, too, for the delightful illustrations!

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Train Cruise
programme.desc: In 1945 at the end of WWII, an atomic bomb hit Nagasaki. We enjoy the stunning scenery, but more importantly we talk with those who survived and remember those who lost their lives.

programme.title: Japanology Plus mini
programme.desc: Japanology Plus explores Japanese life and culture. In this 5-minute digest, we look at tatami mats: a quintessentially Japanese flooring material.

programme.title: Hiroshima's A-Bomb Survivor Trees
programme.desc: Trees that survived the A-bomb have inspired many in Hiroshima. 159 such trees are still alive, but some are nearing their end. We follow a tree surgeon and others who love and care for them.

programme.title: NHK Hiroshima Theme Song

programme.title: AMAMI: Biodiversity
programme.desc: Amami Oshima is a World Natural Heritage Site, with rare flora and fauna including many endemic species. Explore the biodiversity of its lush, subtropical forests in stunning time-lapse footage.

programme.desc: Join May J. for Japanese music! This week: singer Miyakawa Airi, who's popular for her natural charm; and Atarayo, a three-piece band whose young fans love their emotional lyrics, vocals, and sound.

programme.title: Little Charo
programme.desc: Little Charo is an animation series about a Japanese dog who got lost in NY. "I want to see my owner again!" Charo starts his adventure back home. Season 1-19.

programme.desc: Japanology Plus explores Japanese life and culture. In this 5-minute digest, we look at scissors. After arriving in Japan, they evolved in unique ways.

programme.desc: On a hot summer's day, a kitty leads us to traditional food near a local shrine. Get cool in a maiko's home with another kitty before enjoying sparklers at night.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE

programme.title: CYCLE AROUND JAPAN Highlights
programme.desc: The prefecture of Nagasaki, historically Japan's gateway to the west, has a culture influenced by centuries of foreign trade. With over 1,400 islands, it also makes for a unique cycling experience.

programme.title: Story Land in Classical Japanese
programme.desc: This program presents masterpieces of classical Japanese literature in both their original forms and modern translations, with easy-to-understand imagery that conveys the worldview of ancient Japan.

programme.title: Time-lapse Journey
programme.desc: Oze National Park contains the largest mountain wetland in Japan. See the beauty of Oze as time-lapse photography makes the flowers and the morning dew come alive.

programme.desc: Akan-Mashu National Park is home to Lake Akan, Lake Kussharo, and Lake Mashu. It provides unique winter sights and the opportunity to experience the indigenous Ainu culture.

programme.desc: Ashley's father wants her to continue with her violin lessons, but Will has other ideas.

programme.title: The Fresh Prince Of Bel-Air S1 3
programme.desc: Will wants to go out with a beautiful girl he meets at the country club, but first he must figure out how to impress her extremely snobbish and very protective father.

programme.title: The Fresh Prince Of Bel-Air S1 4
programme.desc: When Philip's parents visit from North Carolina, they embarrass him with stories of his poor rural background and his pet pig.

programme.desc: A shady character named "Ice Tray" (guest star Don Cheadle – "Ocean's Thirteen"), one of Will's friends from Philadelphia, comes to Bel-Air for a visit.

programme.title: Friends S5 14
programme.desc: Chandler and Monica's relationship becomes less of a secret. Ross must prove to his boss that he's sane in order to return to work.

programme.title: Friends S5 15
programme.desc: Chandler thinks Monica wants more from their relationship. Ross fails to impress his new neighbors.

programme.title: Friends S5 16
programme.desc: After Phoebe finds a police badge, she uses it to do good deeds. Joey worries that he is in love with Monica.

programme.title: Friends S5 17
programme.desc: Rachel interviews for a great job but she may get it for the wrong reason. Monica competes to have a better relationship than Phoebe's.

programme.title: Friends S5 18
programme.desc: Rachel starts smoking when she realizes that her boss and co-workers at her new job are smokers. Monica and Phoebe plan a surprise birthday party for Rachel. Joey and Ben audition for a commercial.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S3 01
programme.desc: In the season two premiere, Michael poses as a hipster at a farmers market and makes an endless supply of juice. Then things become blurry at the eye doctor, and later, shape shifting aliens send Michael's co-worker into a frenzy.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S3 02
programme.desc: Michael astounds dental patients with molar radio transmissions, and while appraising art, he brings an extinct species back to life. Plus, an unusual brew stirs a ghostly hallucination that will make jaws drop.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S3 03
programme.desc: Michael stretches headphone cords and reality with a mystical putty, stuns a coworker with new bathroom technology, and in the big finale, a Porta Potty becomes a Portal Potty, leaving a construction worker amazed.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S3 04
programme.desc: Working at a tattoo parlor, Michael gets some killer ink in a flash. Then it's SNAKES ON A SEDAN when a serpent ambushes a routine car checkup, and down on the docks, one unlucky guy learns a lesson in shrinkage.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S3 05
programme.desc: Michael unearths a mutant turtle from a mystical Peruvian clay; a woman is blown away when 2 adorable bunnies become 8, and to top it off, a hapless carpenter becomes an accidental time traveler when a potent new glue has him coming undone.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S8 2
programme.desc: Joe, Sal, Murr and Q get ballsy while posing as salesmen, and then try to outdo each other as they invade the personal space of confused strangers. And tonight's loser is up against the ropes, playing dress-up for an unruly arena.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S8 3
programme.desc: Joe, Sal, Murr and Q lend an unhelpful hand while working at a high-tech store, then play detectives at the mall in search of perps on the loose. And tonight's loser gets the shakes while soaring high above the city.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S8 4
programme.desc: Joe, Q, Sal and Murr play a game of "Put-Pocket" at a grocery store, then get jumpy at the park after taking over each other's cell phones. And tonight's big loser learns that when you gotta go…you gotta go.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S8 5
programme.desc: The guys get a little punchy while giving boxing lessons, then head to the mall to share the gift of music with strangers. And when tonight's loser delivers the right speech to the wrong audience, he's the one who gets scared straight.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S8 6
programme.desc: The guys teach a crash course in sorry behavior, ask strangers to settle bizarre debates, and spread surprisingly good news at the mall. Plus, tonight's loser has his hands tied when a day at the park turns into a frightful mess.

programme.title: Run All Night
programme.desc: Lately, it seems Jimmy's only solace can be found at the bottom of a whiskey glass. But when Jimmy's estranged son, Mike (The Killing's Joel Kinnaman), becomes a target, Jimmy must make a choice between the crime family he chose and the real family he abandoned long ago. With Mike on the run, Jimmy's only penance for his past mistakes may be to keep his son from the same fate Jimmy is certain he'll face himself...at the wrong end of a gun. Now, with nowhere safe to turn, Jimmy just has one night to figure out exactly where his loyalties lie and to see if he can finally make things right.

programme.title: Mad Max
programme.desc: Taking place in a dystopian Australia in the near future, Mad Max tells the story of a highway patrolman cruising the squalid back roads that have become the breeding ground of criminals foraging for gasoline and scraps. programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The World Today is the core rolling service of CGTN. keep viewers up-to-date with all the world's top stories as they happen.

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and “accepted wisdom” to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You won’t find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of today’s world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from “Prove That Climate Change Exists” to “Who Will Win the Race to Space”. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk; Challenging perceptions.

programme.title: Africa Live
programme.desc: Africa Live is a news program that focuses on African issues and issues related to this diverse continent. CGTN's Nairobi-based broadcast center produces Africa Live.

programme.title: Talk Africa
programme.desc: Talk Africa is a weekly discussion show that brings the most influential voices in Africa to the world.

programme.title: Sports Scene
programme.desc: Sports Scene brings you closer to all the action from all corners of the world, with highlights from across Europe, North America and China's top sports leagues.

programme.title: Biz Talk
programme.desc: A groundbreaking 30-minute interview show, giving an in-depth look into how top companies around the world conduct business and how policymakers view the fast-changing world economy. It presents 360 degree profiles of industry movers and shakers, tech mavericks and policymakers, and drills down on the stories behind their success, to give you clarity on what’s happening in every facet of business.

programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and “accepted wisdom” to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You won’t find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of today’s world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from “Prove That Climate Change Exists” to “Who Will Win the Race to Space”. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk; Challenging perceptions.

programme.title: Big Story

programme.title: Inheritors

Each 30-minute TV edition is hosted by a long-term expatriate in China who has a unique understanding of the country’s culture. He or she will introduce viewers to people who are dedicating their lives to its protection, inheritance, innovation, development and promotion.

programme.title: Gardening Australia - My Garden Pa - Ben Plant Hunter
programme.desc: Meet Darwin horticulturist Ben Wirth, who spends his days hunting down and collecting seeds of the unique plant species of the Northern Territory.

programme.desc: From farm to fashion, cotton and wool grown in Australia, made in India and exported to the world. How a new trade deal opens up new mass markets and partnerships for Australian farmers.

programme.desc: Michael Parkinson interviews guests Spike Milligan, Harry Secombe, Barry Tuckwell and Gough Whitlam.

programme.desc: Giridharan Sivaraman, Race Discrimination Commissioner, addresses the National Press Club on the topic "There's nothing casual about racism: Getting serious about racial equality in Australia".

programme.desc: Landline visits South-East Asia where a unique charity in Cambodia gives cows to farmers in return for sending their children to school. In Laos a dairy's buffalo rental scheme is helping lift families out of poverty.

programme.desc: An adventure-seeking princess on an official visit to Rome slips away from her chaperones to explore the city with a brash newspaperman, then falls in love with him.

programme.title: Money Mind

programme.title: Model Family
programme.desc: A single-parent family (Yu Xiang and Tong Tong) move into a new neighbourhood where everyone’s life seems perfect. However, while things may look rosy on the outside, dark secrets and horror raid each family from the inside, and nothing really are as they seem.

programme.title: Sinister Doll
programme.desc: A teenager, Pelangi, chances upon a banana tree plantation which is guarded by a mysterious old man. Apart from finding out that a young girl was buried with her favourite doll in this banana plantation decades ago, Pelangi also uncovers a horrifying secret about her death…

programme.title: The Case of Disappearances
programme.desc: In Misty Village, the adopted son Wen Jie is haunted by a recurring nightmare. He delves into a series of disappearance cases in the village to seek his true identity. As more villagers die mysteriously, belief in the curse of Emperor Jing Lung intensifies. Wen Jie teams up with the security chief to unveil the conspiracy and protect the villagers.

programme.title: Never Leave
programme.desc: Strange incidents keep happening in Lin Yue's house after a car accident: her sister cannot see the images of her family members in the mirror; her father is peeping at night; and there is the sound of marbles from the attic every day at dawn. Following the sound to the attic, Lin Yue finds her own death portrait as she opens the door...

programme.title: The Nightmares
programme.desc: A young and successful doctor is tortured by recurrent nightmares after a child patient dies accidentally. The line between dreams and reality starts to blur when the faceless killer from these nightmares comes to life and hunts her down.

programme.title: Bad Blood
programme.desc: A social worker takes a withdrawn homeless boy into her care, not suspecting that he is a vampire. As she gets closer to him, his thirst for human blood increases and to protect him, she must help lure his next kill to satisfy his cravings.

programme.title: She is in Danger
programme.desc: After a fight with her boyfriend, Xue leaves home to stay in a remote B&B accommodation, together with a roommate Yi. One night, Xue accidentally discovers that Yi and another friend have killed Yi's ex-boyfriend, and is locked up by the duo so as to cover up the murder. Xue's buddy, Wen, comes seeking for her - can Xue and Wen escape from danger?

programme.title: 3AM
programme.desc: A taxi driver who is constantly judging others by his own standards, also reads into their every move and sets out to help ‘victims’ in his own way. When a woman he likes seems to be bullied by her son, he goes about setting things right for her, even resorting to turning himself into a cold-blooded serial killer…

programme.title: Interrogation Raw (S1)
programme.desc: After a 20-year-old man is crushed by a truck that fell off its jack, the victim's father is brought in to face questions over whether it was really an accident or murder.

programme.title: Accused: Guilty Or Innocent? (S4)
programme.desc: An argument erupts outside a Florida nightclub. One man is killed, and another is charged with murder. Was it a case of cold-blooded murder, or did he have to shoot to save his own life?

programme.title: Tell Me How I Died
programme.desc: When a Georgia college student disappears, police open an investigation into a possible hate crime and abduction. However, Dr. Jamie Downs uncovers evidence that spins the case in a new direction.

programme.title: After The First 48 (S15)
programme.desc: When a transient man is gunned down, the only eyewitness Mobile detectives have is also a suspect. At trial, reluctant witnesses, defendants pointing fingers at each other.

programme.title: #TextMeWhenYouGetHome (S2)
programme.desc: Those closest to Madison Nygard share the agonising details around the beautiful 16-year-old's terrifying abduction as she walked home from a party.

programme.title: Panic 9-1-1 (S3)
programme.desc: An 11-year-old boy is home alone when a group of robbers breaks into his house. Firefighters plan a dramatic water rescue when a woman's boat gets stuck at the top of a dam.

programme.title: Booked: First Day In (S1)
programme.desc: A first-timer is arrested for reckless driving while on the way to vacation, and a man is brought in on a brandishing a firearm charge while open-carrying in Virginia Beach.

programme.title: My Strange Arrest (S2)
programme.desc: A look at some of the strangest arrests from across the country: a woman turns shoplifting into a game of chance; a clumsy burglar botches a robbery attempt; and more!

programme.title: My Strange Arrest (S1)
programme.desc: A look at some of the strangest arrests from across the country. A man streaks across a golf course, delaying a tournament. A dead fish is eerily placed on the front porch of a house; and more.

programme.title: The First 48 (S22)
programme.desc: In Atlanta, a young man is killed in an apartment when a scheme to make easy money goes wrong. A beloved mother is murdered in a drive by shooting leading St. Louis detectives to a neighborhood turf war.

programme.title: Meet, Marry, Murder (S1)
programme.desc: Feisty Chiquita Tate grew up determined to make something of herself after being raised in poverty by a drug-addicted mom. Now a hard-working lawyer, the only thing missing in her life is a man.

programme.title: Cold Case Files: DNA Speaks
programme.desc: When the blood-smeared car of 27-year-old Stefanie Watson is found in a Maryland parking lot, her family holds out hope she's still alive.

programme.title: Beyond The Headlines: The Series
programme.desc: Tales of toxic love triangles—wives who stray from their husbands with disastrous results, a deadly case of online catfishing, and a lonely young woman who has an affair with a killer.

programme.title: Taking The Stand (S2)
programme.desc: When an entire family is found in a decaying pile of bodies by the side of a Florida road, the hunt is on to find what police fear might be two more victims, Adam Matos and his four-year-old autistic son.

programme.title: Witness To Murder: Digital Evidence
programme.desc: Police quickly identify a suspect in the murder of a local college professor, but a bombshell piece of technology stolen from the crime scene then points them in a completely different direction.

programme.title: Murder At The Motel
programme.desc: The Sheriff's Office in DeRidder, Louisiana, receives a distressing phone call from the owner of Dee's Motel. The man tells them that he's found a woman dead in room 6.

programme.title: Murder In The 21st
programme.desc: A young, pregnant woman is found dead of an apparent suicide in Saginaw, MI, but her family and friends don't believe it. The police discover a shocking secret they never saw coming.

programme.title: Booked: First Day In (S2)
programme.desc: A woman in Hancock is picked up on traffic warrants, but when she is booked, a surprising charge threatens her freedom. A belligerent man busted for being drunk in public requires medical attention.

programme.title: Interrogation Raw (S1)
programme.desc: A man's body is found in a wooded area and the victim's neighbour is brought into the interrogation room, where evidence mounts even as he's being interviewed.

programme.title: Affranchies
programme.desc: An ode to girl power, breaking codes through a hybrid of hip hop and contemporary dance. Through raw energy, five dancers express rage, gentleness and frustration. A sensory, vertiginous journey, inspired by the music of Antonio Vivaldi, Steve Reich and Max Richter.

programme.title: Basique, Le Concert
programme.desc: Singer, producer, dancer and actor, M. Pokora is a veritable showman and every year continues to fill France's greatest concert venues. For ''Basique'', he invites us to discover, or rediscover, the very best of his music past and present with a scenography as intense as it is luminous.

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En FranCais - 1Re Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En FranCais - 2E Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: L'invite
programme.desc: Patrick Simonin hosts the stars in the headlines, culture, music, film, books, an unmissable rendezvous with all those who light up our times.

programme.title: 64' L'essentiel
programme.desc: The whole world, in French.

programme.title: Maurice Chevalier, Un Canotier A Hollywood
programme.desc: A legendary French singer and also an actor, dancer and comic, Maurice Chevalier (1888-1972) became a Hollywood star through films of Ernst Lubitsch, Billy Wilder and Vincente Minnelli, his Menilmontant accent and famous straw hat perfectly capturing the spirit of French irreverence. This is his portrait.

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rtbf
programme.desc: Complete international news roundup presented by the RTBF news staff.

programme.title: Poulets Grilles
programme.desc: Demoted after a professional error, Inspector Anne Capestan is appointed to the mysterious 4th brigade, the police unit that collects the alcoholics, depressed and general misfits cluttering up the force. Yet it's with this unlikely team that she finds herself about to resolve the most important investigation of the moment...

programme.title: Rassemblance
programme.desc: After growing up in different countries around the world, Cathal and Karen Quigg chose to settle in La Celle-Dunoise in the Creuse, where the brother and sister opened the restaurant 'L'auberge des pecheurs' and are giving a new lease of life to this small French village.

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rts
programme.desc: All the news from RTS.

programme.title: Le Journal De France 2
programme.desc: The television news programme of the France 2 editorial board (8 p.m. edition, Paris time).

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En FranCais - 1Re Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En FranCais - 2E Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: L'invite
programme.desc: Patrick Simonin hosts the stars in the headlines, culture, music, film, books, an unmissable rendezvous with all those who light up our times.

programme.title: 64' L'essentiel
programme.desc: The whole world, in French.

programme.title: Pompon Ours
programme.desc: Seven year-old Pompon is a little bear cub. Full of mischief, he also has a precious talent that delights his best friend Rita and his parents: he can take something ordinary and make it amazing. Thanks to his extraordinary imagination, growing up from day to day becomes child's play.

programme.title: Le Petit Prince Et Ses Amis
programme.desc: Elijah and Charlotte join the Little Prince aboard his asteroship, along with his fantastic crew: Fox and Rose. In this unknown universe, they head off on a voyage of discovery amongst the planets and stars. And as they explore the world, they also make plenty of new friends.

programme.title: Conte-Nous !
programme.desc: A long, long time ago, in the heart of the African savannah, animals still had the gift of speech. It was also a time of story-telling, of tales that had so much to teach us, where the main character was a lion, a hyena, a leopard or a frog.

programme.title: Sam & Julia
programme.desc: Arriving from a faraway island, Julia the little mouse moves into a new home with her mother. There she meets Sam, another young mouse who's long lived with his parents and a whole gang of brothers and sisters. They quickly become inseparable and enjoy a host of fun adventures together.

programme.title: Droners
programme.desc: 95% of the planet Terraqua is covered by its oceans. Corto, Arthus, Enki and Mouse make up the Tikis, a team from the idyllic archipelago of Nuï. They have the firm intention of winning the ''Whale Cup'', the biggest drone race ever.

programme.title: Api !
programme.desc: The students criticize the principal and some want the teacher to become the principal. When she meets him in the courtyard, Api tells him about it.

programme.title: Les Croquemoutard
programme.desc: The Kiddycrunchers are a family of Trolls who have been forced to leave their home under the bridge and move into the Shoebox Housing Project to Iive amongst human beings! They discover community life and find that it isn't easy to live amongst these scrumptious creatures with their odd ways!

programme.title: Comme Des Tetes Pas De Poule
programme.desc: Manolo has refused a date with Juju to spend time with his friends but she discovers he's lied to her. Pierre-Charles pretends to be good at skateboarding but Flavie insists on his proving it.

programme.title: Koka Kitoumbou
programme.desc: Malisha, age 10, accompanied by Rikitou, her little woollen doll, heads off for fabulous adventures in search of the Koka Kitoumbou stone. No ordinary stone, it has magical properties and amazing powers, notably that of turning whatever it touches into sweet treats.

programme.title: Opj
programme.desc: As the sun rises, Sergeant Alice Bontemps is practicing yoga on the lagoon, when she is suddenly confronted with a particularly macabre scene: the lifeless body of a young jet-setter, murdered after a very exclusive beach party.

programme.title: Opj
programme.desc: Jackson asks Alice if she wants to head the investigation, as she was the one to discover the body. But the deeper she delves into this world of image and pretence, the more the truth seems to be masked by appearances.

programme.title: Itineraires Paysans
programme.desc: The different attitudes and approaches of French farmers in terms of the environment, economy and landscape. A practical way of understanding a region and its terroir through their working practices.

programme.title: La Vie A Velo
programme.desc: Pierre, Lou, and Elio, three students, traveled 10,000 kilometers across Northern Europe on their bicycles, which became their best adventure companions. Marion meets them in Nangy, Haute-Savoie, to share their last kilometers before reuniting with their loved ones and returning to their daily lives.

programme.title: Stoemp, Peket... Et Des Rawettes
programme.desc: A veritable celebration of Belgium's regions, along with the locals who live there, their regional languages... and their humour!

programme.title: A Bon Entendeur
programme.desc: 'aBE'' examines a wide range of topics affecting everyday life in everyday homes: it tests products, compares prices, highlights fraudulent practices, raises consumer awareness and questions manufacturers. The programme addresses economic, social, environmental and health issues and talks about leisure activities, technology...

programme.title: Les Belges Du Bout Du Monde
programme.desc: Heading for Brittany, its lighthouses, its carved coastline and its Belgian skippers! Meeting with Djemila Tassin and Jonas Gerckens who make Belgium shine in the offshore race. Adrien also has an appointment with Diego Legrelle, a former lawyer, now at the helm of his boat in the Finistere.

programme.title: Le Telejournal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: La Carte Aux Tresors
programme.desc: Heading for Quiberon Bay and the surrounding area. The game stretches from the Riviere d'etel to the gateway to the Gulf of Morbihan via Carnac, Locoal-Mendon and the island of Hoëdic. Contestants: Marine and Daniel.

programme.title: echappees Belles
programme.desc: The Caribbean coast of Colombia is lined with magnificent beaches, breathtaking landscapes and colonial towns which shaped the face of South America. Its hot and sunny climate, relaxed atmosphere, historical sites and vast nature reserves make it a perfect holiday destination.

programme.title: Questions Pour Un Champion
programme.desc: A general knowledge quiz.

programme.title: Les Chefs !
programme.desc: The seven participants put together a fish starter using American monkfish, plus a main dish of venison with mushrooms.

programme.title: Tv5Monde, Le Journal
programme.desc: All the national and international news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: Fort Boyard Et Les Cellules Interdites
programme.desc: The Les Bonnes Fees association works to improve living conditions for women. A tribute to Patrice Laffont, the iconic presenter from 1990 to 1999, who died in August 2024, just a few weeks after filming. With Sylvie Tellier, Patrice Laffont, Cendrine Dominguez, Theo Curin, Camille Cerf, Brahim Zaibat.

programme.title: Baisers Voles
programme.desc: After his military service, Antoine Doinel has a series of odd jobs: night watchman, TV repairman, warehouseman... Then he is employed as a ''mole'' by a specialist agency. His mission: get employed by a business to discretely watch its employees and what goes on there...

programme.title: Maestro
programme.desc: By moonlight, in the depths of a forest, a choir of wild animals conducted by a squirrel perform a piece from a Bellini opera.

programme.title: Invincible
programme.desc: Behind the steering wheel of a car, a young boy holds back his tears and his breath while a female voice speaks to him on the telephone. Based on a true story, the last 48 hours of the life of Marc-Antoine, aged 14, confronted by his urgent need for freedom.

programme.title: Planete Rap
